title: Anyone else experiencing severely bad packet loss since 7.1 release?

replies.body:
Most issues with packet loss seem to stem from routing changes made by an ISP or network partner. If you haven't already, I'd strongly suggest working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can confirm that your local network settings are compatible with League.

If you encounter further Packet Loss issues, hit me up so we can further troubleshoot this. ^.^
Yes, Riot is not addressing it, I've been frequenting these forums with the same issue and I've seen a good amount of people all having this issue.
been having the same issue for about a week now. The game is totally unplayable.
